meanings.definition: A woman who manages a post office.
meanings.sent1: The postmistresses in our town are always friendly and helpful.
meanings.sent2: I visited the postmistresses to buy some stamps for my letters.
meanings.sent3: The postmistresses organized a fun event at the post office.
meanings.sent4: She runs the post office like a team captain, the postmistresses leading the way.
meanings.sent5: The postmistresses' dedication to their work is truly admirable.

meanings.sent1: The postmistresses were all busy sorting the mail.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of postmistresses chatting outside the post office.
meanings.sent3: The postmistresses decided to have a picnic together after work.
meanings.sent4: The postmistresses stood out in their matching uniforms.
meanings.sent5: The postmistresses' teamwork ensured efficient mail delivery.
